name: "Utopia" Untitled FPS Project (Prototype Demo)
description:
First ever public released project by SmugRobotStudios.

A very short Doom-Like FPS Game Where you can beat up and shoot multiple fat bald men in two different levels.... that's as far as I got while developing test it out for yourself and comment what you think about it!

Note: When it asks for firewall privileges just click no/cancel as it doesn't need access to the internet to play or work.
